p.k: Adrenaline rises at our crew, the start is iminent. Christmas party early with the family before the departure to 8 weeks of hostile seas along the Antarctic Peninsula. The wind blows and the sea is rough, the vigilance is required, the crew relays for monitoring, on the bridge. And one day... land in sight! The island of Pierre 1er... . The small family discovers a preserved fauna and flora: the nature reigns supreme on earth Ad√©lies!
